TopicTitle: Numeric entry to part parameter fields and the part manager is bad

Articles.Content:
In KSP1, you could toggle between sliders and numeric entry on part menus.  You could then enter a precise value in the field. This is really needed functionality.

The current part manager interface is AWFUL. It's really unfriendly and makes tasks like selecting a docking port on a craft as a target you want to dock with very difficult.
